name: BomberBoy
summary: BomberBoy is a port of the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game Mega Bomberman (itself a port of the PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 game Bomberman '94) for the Famicom made by Super Game and released on a multicart in 1997 by an unknown publisher. While being only released in 1997, it appears to be Super Game's first title, made around 1995 and unfinished for unknown reasons.
